title: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
description: A premium 10% Vitamin C formulation designed for Oily, Combination skin types.
key_benefits: Vitamin C promotes skin brightening for a more radiant complexion.
Hyaluronic Acid helps to hydrate and plump the skin.
Vitamin C works to visibly fade the appearance of dark spots.
This formula combines ingredients for enhanced skin clarity.
